boardgame.name: Android
boardgame.description: From the publisher: Android is a board game of murder and conspiracy set in a dystopian future. Detectives travel between the city of New Angeles and moon colony Heinlein chasing down leads, calling in favors, and uncovering the sinister conspiracy beneath it all. The detectives must balance their pursuit of the murderer against their personal lives and their inner demons. Android_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s innovative mechanics ensure that no two detectives play alike. Will you play as Louis Blaine, the crooked cop tormented by guilt and loss? Or will you take the role of Caprice Nisei, the psychic clone who struggles to retain her sanity while proving that she_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s as human as anyone else? Whoever you choose to play, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ve got just two weeks to solve the murder, uncover the conspiracy, and face your personal demons._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During a round, the players get action points to spend on various actions, like moving their detectives, following leads that appear on locations, solving their personal demons, or doing a location-specific action. In this way, the detectives try to advance on three different sectors: solving the murder, uncovering the conspiracy behind the murder, and finding their inner peace. To solve the murder, the detectives follow leads that appear on New Angeles and Heinlein, and find evidence that they plant on the suspect of their choice. The conspiracy puzzle is also solved by following leads, and may alter the way victory points are distributed at the end of the game. Finally, each detective has his/her own personal plots that are resolved gradually throughout the game. If the detective invests enough time in the plot, he/she will be awarded victory points; otherwise, he will suffer penalties._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when two in-game weeks (12 rounds) have passed. At that point, victory points are awarded based on the aforementioned sectors. The player with the most victory points is the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG AD01) Android is a board game of murder and conspiracy set in a dystopian future. Detectives travel between the city of New Angeles and moon colony Heinlein chasing down leads, calling favors, and uncovering the sinister conspiracy beneath it all. The detectives must balance their pursuit of the murderer against their personal lives and inner demons. Android_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s innovative mechanics ensure that no two detectives play alike. Will you play as Louis Blaine, the crooked cop tormented by guilt and loss? Or will you take the role of Caprice Nisei, the psychic clone who struggles to retain her sanity while proving she_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s just as human as anyone else? Whomever you choose to play, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got just two weeks to solve the murder, uncover the conspiracy, and face your personal demons. Better get moving, detective. Android is a game for 3-5 players and takes between 2-4 hours to play.

Game is new and in shrink. Payment possible via Paypal or Bank transfer. Shipping within Germany: 4,50 Euro. We ship only to EU-countries (insured and with online tracking)! Shipping costs are: * 12,50 Euro * 10,- Euro if you order games for 100,- Euro or more Thank you for your interest and please take a look at our online-shop at www.cosimshop.de !

*** 4th Dimension Games *** ANDROID: $40.00 In Stock (7% sales tax for residents of Pennsylvania) This is a New, Sealed in Box Android board game. Publisher: Fantasy Flight Games [FFGAD01] Number of Players: 3-5 Length: 180 minutes Shipping: Shipping is $10.00 within the United States only. International Shipping (including Alaska and Hawaii) is available and rates will be determined upon request. Insurance is optional but highly recommended for higher priced items. Payment: I accept PayPal, money orders and cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks. Personal checks will be accepted but I will wait until the check has cleared before sending the item. Return Policy: I want you to be completely satisfied with your item. Because of this, I will accept return of any item for a refund of the purchase price within 30 days of the sale. The item must be in the same condition that it was sent. I cannot refund the shipping cost.

Punched and thoroughly organized, but never played. Includes some laminated reference sheets and a handmade tuck box. Outer box has some shelf wear and minor dings on the corners but everything inside is pristine. Whatever insert was there I have tossed though. I have organized all of the non-player-specific components very nicely using a double-sided Plano case that is yours for an extra $7. Otherwise I will put the components into a few baggies (but be warned, there are a ton of components in this game). Ask for a picture if you are interested. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $11.35 for USPS Priority Mail with tracking (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$5.00 (sorry, it is a much bigger hassle on my end, plus I need to provide the box). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.
